result.execSummary:
Anthony Steven Robinson Jr was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Anthony Steven Robinson Jr was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Anthony Steven Robinson Jr

records.addlTxt: Attorney Christopher John Ertl in court.  Emily S Zimmel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant extradited to IL DOC.  Case administratively closed.  kmw

Defendant Anthony Steven Robinson in court with attorney Christopher John Ertl.  Defendant Anthony Steven Robinson in custody.  Erin Michelle Karshen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney appeared by video means.
Case in court for status conference. Defendant does nt dispute the governor's warrant and waive right to challenge extradition. Case adjourned for status in Br. 34  Status conference scheduled for April 25, 2022 at 09:15 am.

Defendant Anthony Steven Robinson in court with attorney Christopher John Ertl.  Defendant Anthony Steven Robinson in custody.  Erin Michelle Karshen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case is court for review on extradition. Court adjourns matter for a status. Case  remain calendared in Br. 34.  Status conference scheduled for April 14, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Anthony Steven Robinson in court, in custody.  Stephan Eduard Nolten appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant appears without counsel.  Court advised defendant of his right for counsel, defendant waived his right to counsel.  Court found paperwork adequate and sufficient, defendant was advised his right to writ of habeas corpus, no writ was applied for.  The Court REMANDED defendant and will appear for review hearing  in Br 34.  mn  Review hearing scheduled for April 13, 2022 at 09:00 am.
BR. 38 JUDGE WAGNER FOR BR. 45 JUDGE KIES:  Case heard off the record.  ADA Stephen Nolten emailed of next Court date by email.  Court deputy notified of next court date.

Defendant Anthony Steven Robinson not in court, defendant in custody.  John Theodore Chisholm appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Due to very lengthy calendar, Br 45 is scheduling this matter for status in Br 38.  mn  Status conference scheduled for March 8, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Anthony Steven Robinson Jr
Current: 3879 N 38th St, Milwaukee, WI 53210 United States  (Effective: 02-04-2022)
Prior: 2970 North 37th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53210

Defendant Anthony Steven Robinson in court with attorney Charles Robert Roozen.  Defendant Anthony Steven Robinson in custody.  amy E spanczak appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Anthony Steven Robinson appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Kies, Branch 45.  Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of rights and right to file a Writ of Habeas Corpus.  Court found the defendant is the person wanted in the State of ILLINOIS.  Defendant contested extradition.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT.  Court ordered Defendant REMANDED into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department.  
This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast: https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d66d5f44-cf7a-0e03-96c5-92d4fbbd91a4  Status conference scheduled for February 4, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
